channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- FluentAuth
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- FluentAuth

item.title: CVE-2022-4746|2024-08-03T01:48:40.395Z -- unknown -- fluentauth
item.description: The FluentAuth WordPress plugin before 1.0.2 prioritizes getting a visitor's IP address from certain HTTP headers over PHP's REMOTE_ADDR, which makes it possible to bypass the IP-based blocks set by the plugin.
